products.title: Burst Blushed Plum Vertical Blind
products.description: This blushed plum coloured blind is perfect for adding a warmer, purple hue to your home. The plum shade is great for creating a rich and inviting theme in your home. This blind is a dimout fabric, so will help to bathe your room in a warming glow. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash smokey purple vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish. A moisture-resistant dark purple fabric with a beautiful dark purplehue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash sloe purple is a chic soft purple vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this purple vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Deep Plum 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This deep plum blackout vertical blind adds a bold shade to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new dark purple blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms. At swift direct blinds, not only is is this purple vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

products.title: Bella Blackout Smokey Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This soft bella blackout smokey purple vertical blind brings warm-toned splash of purple to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Dark Purple - Vertical Blind
products.description: The deep shade of the origin (blackout) in dark purple can't help but be the star of the show, with its smooth texture and lightweight feel. Let the outside in, or keep it out, by adjusting the louvres accordingly. Set the dark purple against pale cream walls and bring the colour to life with occasional silver ornaments, frames, and fittings. Or instead, give your hallway or landing a boost of colour to add depth and intrigue to magnolia or beige walls.
